formalpara.title: Figure 1. C. elegans colonized by Staphylococcus aureus expressing GFP
formalpara.para: The anterior intestine is distended to the full width of the animal (arrows, left panel). Epifluorescence image of the same field (middle) shows that S. aureus colonizes the entire intestine. Individual bacteria can be resolved at high-magnification, as shown in merged bright-field and epifluorescence images (right). Photo: Jakob Begun and Frederick M. Ausubel.
